body: If only 10 teams registered the tournament , only these 10 teams will play?. Btw: XENARCH ARE 4 ARE FORTISSIMUS 10 (IDK) IM WORRIED

title: TOURNEY HELP

replies.body: Fortissimus has 17 players invited, we had all of them before we got deleted somehow.
replies.body_tagged: Fortissimus has 17 players invited, we had all of them before we got deleted somehow.

replies.body: Fort is a special case, Xenarch and Nico and the Band needs to get their players to register.
replies.body_tagged: Fort is a special case, Xenarch and Nico and the Band needs to get their players to register.

replies.body: We accept the first 8 teams, including Fort.
replies.body_tagged: We accept the first 8 teams, including Fort.

replies.body: Rilo and I are fixing Xenarch. It should be good
replies.body_tagged: Rilo and I are fixing Xenarch. It should be good

reply_to.body: We accept the first 8 teams, including Fort.
reply_to.body_tagged: We accept the first 8 teams, including Fort.

replies.body:
Fort registered before Xenarch and Nico and TheBand so that's why those two teams won't be playing, the reason why they can still register is because it was expected to have 16 teams, so the only way to continue with the system that was supposed to be used is to halve the amount of teams, hence 8.

Edit: Maybe 10 teams will work, I'm not to sure though.
